For the conformations extracted from the data-sets Sic1 1 and Sic1 2 , the resulting gyration radii agree with the measurement of 3.0 ± 4.1 Å given in Figure 2E of Ref. 17. But, for pSic1 1 and pSic1 2 , the resulting gyration radii are smaller than the measurements of Ref. 17: this is particularly true for the BioEn processing whereas the RamaMix processing displays values closer to those of Gomes et al. 17 On the more extended conformations (pSic1 3 ), all resulting gyration radii are significantly closer to the Gomes et al 17 measurements, for BioEn and RamaMix processing.
